Package com.csse3200.game.components.maingame

package com.csse3200.game.components.maingame
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.csse3200.game.components
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DifficultyDisplay
     
    MainGameActions
    This class listens to events relevant to the Main Game Screen and does something when one of the events is triggered.
    MainGameExitDisplay
    Displays a button to exit the Main Game screen to the Main Menu screen.
    MainGameWin
    Displays a button to exit the Main Game screen to the Main Menu screen.
    MapHighlighter
    A grid overlay that visually highlights map tiles during tower placement and shows tower attack ranges when a tower is selected.
    PauseInputComponent
    ESC/P toggles pause.
    PauseMenuDisplay
     
    PlayerNameDisplay
    UI component that displays the player's name in the top-left corner of the game screen.
    SaveMenuDisplay
    Save menu display component that shows save options and status.
    SimplePlacementController
    Controller for managing tower placement within the game world.
    SimplePlacementController.SummonSpec
     
    SummonPlacementController
    专门负责“召唤物放置”的控制器：幽灵预览 + 左键落地。 使用方式： - armSummon("images/engineer/Sentry.png") 进入放置； - update() 内部会移动幽灵并处理落地； - cancelPlacement() 取消放置并清理幽灵。
    TowerHotbarDisplay
     
    TowerUpgradeData
    Stores upgrade paths and stats for all tower types.
    TowerUpgradeData.UpgradeStats
    Represents the upgrade stats for a tower at a certain level.
    TowerUpgradeMenu
    UI component for displaying and upgrading towers.
